title: Ok, I have one complaint about League lore.
body:
Why does every champions parents/mentors have to die? Seriously, Even {{champion:154}} the wholesome goo man himself, had his parents die his last lore update.
Does riot just have a parent killing fetish or something? You don't need a characters parents/mentor to die for them to be interesting.
Heck the 2 I just thought of who's parents are still alive are:
{{champion:99}} : Who has a strained relationship with hers.
{{champion:86}} : Who's mentor and father figure, His Uncle, Died.

replies.body: Ekko's parents are also alive.

Well, let's look at the line-up (only including champions where their parents are actually a part of the story):

Parents confirmed dead: {{champion:1}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:154}} 
Parents missing: {{champion:103}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:518}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:163}}^{{champion:254}} {{champion:498}} 
Parents alive: {{champion:51}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:145}}^^ {{champion:55}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:110}}^^^

^It's highly likely that they're alive, though.
^^Assuming she really IS Kassadin's daughter.
^^^Well, at least one of the three entities that makes up Varus.

Note: I personally have no idea about Akali. Her parents are mentioned but it's never said what happens to them after she leaves.

While it does seem common for Riot to kill off parents, it's not like Disney.

Tell me if I missed any.
Do we even know if Fizz/yordles in general _have_ parents?

Yeah, from Lulu's bio. And if Fizz's homeland disappeared, it logically means that his parents were there too (unless they were wanderers like him or already dead).

May or may not be canon now, but Lulu's bio hasn't been updated yet, so I'm just gonna assume they do have parents.
